availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Portsmouth, Ohio. Mustered in on September 15, 1862, and designation changed to 1st Ohio Volunteer Heavy Artillery Regiment (U.S.A.) on May 2, 1863. Commander(s): Lieutenant Colonel Chauncey D. Hawley.

ab.bibl:
Frederick H. Dyer, A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion, Vol. I (Des Moines, IA: The Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), 1546.
Official Roster of the Soldiers of the State of Ohio in the War of Rebellion, 1861-1866, Vol. X (Akron, OH: The Werner ptg. and mfg. co., 1887), 257-259.
